name: [>RETURN]
description:
[>RETURN]

Return, an FTL and Battlestar Galactica inspired game, tasking you with saving your people from complete annihilation in a sudden blitzkrieg war, bypassing all your defenses. Can you return in time to save the homeworld, and who will you sacrifice to make it happen?

Return is in a pre-pre-pre-Alpha state right now, and is still in active and heavy development. Follow along, either here or at Our Website to see more about where this game goes!
